def_en: Facing is fabric which is stitched inside the edges of a piece of clothing in order to make them look neat and strengthen them.

def_cn: (夹克或大衣领口和袖口的)镶边，贴边
def_en: The facings of a garment such as a jacket or coat are the parts around the neck and wrists when they are made of a different fabric from the main part, or are a different colour.
A facing on a wall is a layer of stone, concrete, or other material that is spread over its surface in order to make it look attractive.
